script_description: This script runs an IceTray simulation using a Python script named 'step_1_snowstorm_propagation.py'. It utilizes the 'py3-v4.1.0' environment and the 'tensorflow_gpu_py3-v4.1.0' virtual environment, with a CUDA installation at '/usr/local/cuda-10.0'. The script runs with PBS resource allocation based on the provided parameters, including number of nodes, processors per node, memory, walltime, and PBS job ID. It outputs the processed data to a specified location and manages the handling of crashed files.
